actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a study on the recruitment and retention of foster parents in the United States.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) to study the recruitment and retention of foster parents of children served by any foster care program funded under part E (Foster Care and Adoption Assistance) of title IV of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct a study on the recruitment and retention of foster parents in the United States.
